definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The model of concert force provides a method of dimensional evaluation for the empirical succinctness.
sentences.chinese: 協調力模式給出了經驗簡潔性的量化評估方法。

sentences.english: Vectorization is a crucial step in the automatic punching.
sentences.chinese: 矢量化是圖像自動編針中很重要的步驟。

sentences.english: We've got the concept, but we haven't quantified it yet.
sentences.chinese: 我們有了這個概念，但是我們沒有量化它。

sentences.english: For plastic molders , an equally strong consideration for lightweighting is cost.
sentences.chinese: 塑料機，一個同樣重要的考慮輕量化是成本。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a quantifying model of retinopathy with vascular proliferation in mouse.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立可量化的血管增生性視網膜病變小鼠模型。

sentences.english: Quantify all accomplishments with dollar figures or percentages and time periods.
sentences.chinese: 將你每個時期的成就用美元或百分比量化出來。

sentences.english: Errors of "single channel quantized" correlators are analysed.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了單邊量化相關器的誤差。

sentences.english: Quantifying the employment impact of these new technologies is difficult.
sentences.chinese: 量化這些新技術對就業的影響是很困難的。

sentences.english: A new multi-stage vector quantizer(MSVQ) of line spectral frequency parameters is designed.
sentences.chinese: 設計了一種新的線譜頻率參數多級矢量量化編碼方案。

sentences.english: Quantized affine transformation T constitutes the fractal block coding of the image block.
sentences.chinese: 量化後的仿射變換T構成了圖像塊的分形塊編碼。

sentences.english: Qualify and quantify the business goals.
This factor, although difficult to quantify, can be gauged using various metrics.
sentences.chinese: 這項因素雖然難量化，可以被衡量使用不同的度量。

sentences.english: An improved watermarking algorithm of odd-even quantification based on chaotic map is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於混沌映射的改進奇偶量化水印算法。

sentences.english: Study of Vector Quantization Fast Codeword Search Algorithms;
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種矢量量化快速碼字搜索算法。

sentences.english: Make the goal something tangible, something which canbe measured.
sentences.chinese: 使你的目標實體化且能夠被量化的標準所衡量。

sentences.english: A finite-state vector quantization correlated encoding (FSVQ-CEC) strategy is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了有限狀態矢量量化相關編碼方案。

definition: to fit (data to a model)/a (close) fit
to give a more granular level of detail/to elaborate/to refine/to become more differentiated

pinyin: guan1 jian4 ji4 xiao4 zhi3 biao1
